articles.author: Jason Lange, Patricia Zengerle
articles.title: US public support declines for arming Ukraine, Reuters/Ipsos poll shows - Reuters
articles.description: Support is falling among Americans of both major political parties for supplying Ukraine with weapons, a warning sign for Kyiv, which relies heavily on U.S. arms to fight against a Russian invasion, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.
